snippet: The State Senate gave final approval on Thursday to a bill that would allow gun owners to fire warning shots to ward off attackers in dangerous situations.
abstract: Florida State Senate gives final approval to bill that would allow gun owners to fire warning shots to ward off attackers in dangerous situations.
lead_paragraph: The State Senate gave final approval on Thursday to a bill that would allow gun owners to fire warning shots to ward off attackers in dangerous situations.

headline.main: Florida: ‘Warning Shot’ Bill Is Sent to Governor
headline.print_headline: Florida: ‘Warning Shot’ Bill Is Sent to Governor
